cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on September 30, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4785, Uyghur Policy Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 133 (Thursday, July 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. KIM of California:
H.R. 4785.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H4293]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: To support the human rights of Uyghurs and members of other minority groups residing primarily in Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region and safeguard their distinct identity, and for other purposes.
